DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine participation one three different health management group elicit genomic biochemical change decrease perceived stress level symptom healthy , stressed adult . The investigator expect change self-reported psychological stress symptom directly link change biological indicator ( genomic expression profile neuroendocrine pro-inflammatory biomarkers ) .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , control trial determine relative strength correlation change stress outcome measure ( self-report questionnaire , genomic expression , biochemical assay ) moderately severely stress healthy subject randomize one three health education intervention end-intervention 6-month long-term follow-up . This study also determine different outcome measure exhibit great degree sensitivity , reliability consistency end-intervention long-term follow-up .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 old Stress chronic ongoing resolution stressor within timeframe study , minimum prior duration 6 month . Able provide inform consent understand write spoken English . Practice yoga , meditation , guide imagery mind body technique elicit RR , per week 45 min total within last three month less . Any current medical condition would preclude safe effective practice yoga meditation intervention . The presence bipolar psychotic disorder , history DSMIV Axis I disorder active symptom treatment within last 5 year , determine structured clinical interview . Initiation psychotherapy within 6 month enter study . Serious unstable medical illness , include serious unstable cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , endocrine , neurologic hematologic disease . Patient deem unable complete protocol due cognitive , psychiatric reason . Pregnancy plan conception course study ( could confound biomarker value ) . Current use follow medication : systemic corticosteroid , chronic ( i.e. , 3 day per week ) use antiinflammatories ( e.g. , ibuprofen ; currently within last 3 month ) , immunosuppressive cytotoxic therapy ( currently within last 12 month ) , anabolic steroid . Current ( within last 6 month ) psychoactive medication ( e.g . antidepressant , mood stabilizer , antipsychotic , anxiolytic ) , exception hypnotic , permit .
